name: The Beta Tester-Demo
description:
It is a project that I did two years ago, it has as aTheme of solidarity is  about a mysterious guy who gives work to our unemployed protagonist, although solidarity in itself is not the main theme. 

It is a game made an RPG Maker VX Ace, with its acquired license, the content has to be downloaded.

It is about an unemployed boy, who finds a job from the internet of dubious origin as a beta tester believing that he is going to play video games ...

Far from reality (I think you could say that ... literally), it turns out that he is the test subject for his boss's dungeons, as if he were a video game character.

This video game is only in Spanish.
